website_summaries.verdict: An enchanting electronic pet from a well-loved brand, this baby snow leopard begs to be nurtured.
pros: Soft and lovable “baby” design needs to be taken care of, providing little ones with a sense of empowerment
Coos when fed and responds to the rattle with sound and movement
cons: Doesn’t offer as many features as the Get Up And GoGo, but at half the price, this is expected

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pet
customer_reviews.text: I have two girls and wanted them to have similar, but different Christmas gifts. I got this and the Fur Real Friends My Baby Panda, Pom Pom. They both walk to the rattle make chattering animal sounds and are the same size. You can find YouTube videos of the panda to get an idea of what the two toys do. I'll try to come back after Christmas and post a picture or video of both toys in action.
customer_reviews.author: JustAddCoffee

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I had this sent to my granddaughters for a gift. They are 7 & 10. According to them "they share everything!" This is cute and interactive. It did not need a battery change as others stated. But that would not be a deal breaker. Glad Amazon turned off the demo mode. I bought another at the big box store that had been sold out on Amazon and went through all of the noise modes for a couple of weeks spontaneously even after wraps. Makes for a fun 18 hundred miles drive. The girls do love them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cute and priced well!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted a pet snow leopard for Christmas so this was the closest to the real thing ;). She was so excited to open this up. Her fur is super soft and we love that she does walk towards her toy. She walks better on hardwood floors then carpeted. Also, make sure she is in the on mode rather then the demo. We thought the price for this was reasonable for the features.
customer_reviews.author: Al D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on the “on” mode, only demo
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a constant issue for this one item. It won’t work on the “on” mode, only demo. I have read the reviews and was ok with having to change the batteries as soon as I received it. No big deal. I changed them. It still won’t work. I now have recharageable batteries charging and hoping that works before I have to return it. My daughter has multiple for real friends like the panda, penguin, tiger, dragon, monkey and many many more. So I love this brand and what they make. I just don’t understand why they are continuing to sell a defective item. There is an obvious issue, so buyers beware of this specific forreal friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Good Range of Behaviors for this Price
customer_reviews.text: Engenders real affection. Motor sounds are not too jarring. Movement is only in the legs. and only in a walking motion. But for this price range, I feel this is a good deal. The head and legs are pose-able. She will walk toward the sound of the rattle (or any sound). If you lay her on her back, she will coo or snore. Very cute. There is no padding under the fur, so you can feel the plastic robot parts underneath but that's a common issue that doesn't seem to bother my child.
customer_reviews.author: lkfsdg

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well received
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves her baby snow leopard! Of all the toys she got, this was her favorite. It actually walks which is impressive because we have the far more expensive Roaring tiger and he doesn't walk at all. The fur is soft, but the paws are made of felt and the eyes don't blink. I bought it on sale for $35 on Black Friday which was a great deal, but I think if I paid retail price for it I would be slightly disappointed. Overall it's a decent present for a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Scolaro

customer_reviews.title: So happy with her
customer_reviews.text: The best Christmas purchase ever, she has gone to school with my 3 1/2 year old since January. She loves her "baby kitty." The snow leopard is adorable and easy for young kids to operate. My daughter turns her on when she want the leopard awake and turns her off when she wants the leopard to sleep. She's taken a few tumbles and still works great. I can't say how happy I am with this purchase! Would definitely recommend the FurReal Friends toys.
customer_reviews.author: NewBert

customer_reviews.title: Just too cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old granddaughter last year for a gift and she was just overjoyed... and she still loves it. Super cute toy. Last report over this past weekend was she had a playdate with a friend who also has a furreal pet and they had too much fun. Seems to be holding up very well, but she's not hard on toys.
customer_reviews.author: Angie T.

customer_reviews.title: Meh...Okay Toy but not too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year old daughter really wanted this for Christmas, however she and I were both disappointed. She in that it doesn't do much (not very interactive) and me because it was almost fifty dollars. This would be an okay present for $20 to $25 but not worth what it's currently going for.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaH000

customer_reviews.title: Cute pet
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little animal I love how you can move the legs and arms yourself without fear of them breaking like most toys so it made that perfect for my young daughter, and being able to play with it standing, on its back and walking around makes it a great toy and my daughters love it
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Our Snow Baby is Loved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a FurReal Pet for Christmas. I found this soft little baby on sale and snatched her up. This was my daughter's (7) favorite toy from Santa. She carries "Rocky' everywhere. The noises she makes reminds me of the movie gremlin but it is not too annoying lol. She is very soft, not too loud, walks a bit, smacks, makes noises. My daughter LOVES her! I've yet to see this one in the store so my daughter feels her pet is special.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect side track from a real kitten for now
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter wants a real kitten and we don't so when I saw this it was just right. It perrs and cuddles and walks takes its bottle and all without having to deal with a litter box yeaaaaaaaaaaaa. One neet thing is if she is drinking a fountain drink she lets it (and it makes the sounds) drink from her straw.. This is the perfect side track from a real kitten for now.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Ferreal, furreal!
customer_reviews.text: These stupid toys are redonkulous expensive. This one was very reasonably priced. Kid loved it! Meows, purrs, “eats and drinks”. Walks around. Overall, very cute without emptying my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilpon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: First, I was supposed to be reimbursed for shipping after it was shipped. Customer service has been quick to reply and reimburse me for shipping. Great Customer Service! 2nd, the stitching on the front right arm separated, so the fabric is ripping apart. My daughter loves it, but the fabric is so thin, it's falling apart after playing with it only 2 weeks. We own another FurReal Friends pony, and have had no problems with that one.
customer_reviews.author: CBevan13

customer_reviews.title: Surprise gift
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and so far with the demo play my daughter will love it now I just to get some 4 double A batteries since only demo batteries are included but a really great buy
customer_reviews.author: Marco Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Happy granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter didn't asked for anything for Christmas her younger sister asked for Tyler so decided to get her this one and it was a hit. She carries her baby everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Delgado

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can switch it off when she goes ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two year old daughter's birthday. She loves it so much and it goes everywhere she goes. I like that I can switch it off when she goes to bed so it won't keep her awake because of course it sleeps in bed with her. I was worried from some other reviews that it wouldn't be cuddly enough because of the plastic body but it doesn't seem to bother her at all that it's not completely soft like a stuffed animal. All my nieces and nephews like to take turns playing with it as well so I would call this a great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The kitty is super cute and has several accessories
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when we received this exclusive FurReal Friends by Amazon. The kitty is super cute and has several accessories. However, it has stopped working - already (less than 1 month after purchase.) I'm not sure if Hasbro is aware their products have short lives in the hands of little ones but someone needs to host test groups with 4 and 5 year olds in the Hasbro camp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a month and a half im so disappointed this was a expensive birthday present for my daughter just one day wouldn't turn on i changed the batteries but that didn't do any thing its sad it was one of her favorite toys
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: cute toy, just a tad boring.
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy but gets old after a while. My daughter totes it around with her from time to time and pretends to feed it. However after 15 minutes of doing this she gets tired of it and leaves it around the house. She is 4, and we do have animals in the home so maybe this is why it doesn't have the same appeal as a child without a toy
customer_reviews.author: A. Good

customer_reviews.title: 🎁
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift and if you want to drive another parent crazy get it beautiful once you touch pat the back it walks and purrs like a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Ok I will confess I got this for myself and no kids are involved, the other adults in the house love it as much as me. It is super cute and fun to interact with. I will have many hours of enjoyment. It is really cute and fun. Was everything I was expecting and more. I will make this a yearly gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Cat

customer_reviews.title: fun a furry
customer_reviews.text: this is a great toy. fun to play with and great for teaching little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy ray

customer_reviews.title: Only moved, made no sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in early November and got a great deal. Didn't open it until Christmas morning when my 3 year old wanted to play. We followed the instructions and changed the batteries to use the snow leopard in play mode instead of demo. The snow leopard would walk and respond to fish but would not respond to the bottle nor make any sound. Half of the functionality was not what I expected. Called amazon and of course the item is no longer available, and because it's an amazon exclusive I can't get it anywhere else. Pretty bummed that my 3 year old is out a Christmas gift, and my only option was a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Allysa Fite

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really liked it. It did what it was suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Harbison

customer_reviews.title: Thank. Very nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Thank. Very nice toy. Quality and well packaged. Granddaughter is very happy. The delight of the child.
customer_reviews.author: Alla Serebro

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I expected. My daughter loves it. She plays with it every day
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lenex

customer_reviews.title: Not really great, pretty boring.
customer_reviews.text: This was on the Christmas list this year, to me it's a total waste of money. It's boring and was played with for like 10 minutes. I wouldn't recommend it. Get one of the newer ones if you must have an interactive animal.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingForMyPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Cute but.....
customer_reviews.text: This was cute but not worth the money I paid for it. I was looking for something larger for the price kinda was disappointed with it when it came in
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: While cute ... overpriced product
customer_reviews.text: While its very cute and my daughter loved it ... don't think its worth the hype ... not really sure if I would waste money on it again.
customer_reviews.author: AshChen17

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought it did more than what it does. My daughter likes it at least. It’s cute, and she likes when it walks.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loved It
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old granddaughter loved it. I was a little disappointed in it because I expected a bit more for the cost. But that may just be about me!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing ever. My daughter loved it. It moves its legs and purrs
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, nice size. Purchased for my daughter and she loves it and it has held up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: 4 y/o niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of “talking cat” toys available, this was by far one of the best options and the price was worth it! The actions are great, the fur is incredibly soft and would recommend. My niece asked Santa for it so Auntie here helped Santa make it come true. Her grandpa even bought her an iPad and she loved this way more (go figure!) Super great addition for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Change batteries as soon as you take it out of the box
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old girl loved it. Easy to play with
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to a young girl so I can't really say much about it. Looks like all the pictures. Wouldn't be fair to give it less than 5 stars even though my 5 stars are meaningless since I've only seen it once, in the box.
customer_reviews.author: David Gorick

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute toy. I'm glad i was able to purchase when the price was low as I've seen it go way way up. It doesn't do as much as we thought it would but my 5.5 year old is still obsessed it with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Girls

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Hard to find toy and this is a good price. A gift for my great-granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: msempress

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few hours!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my 7 year old girl, and it was broken by Christmas night. One of the legs snapped completely in half from normal 7 year old play. Try explaining to a 7 year old why Santa brought a crappy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing - though it’s not quite as interactive as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cindarelli

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Daughter says she loves that she follows the rattle and what she doesn’t like is that she sucks on everything you put in her mouth. Would recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about purchasing it at first but when my daughter opened it, I LOVED IT!! It walks and makes noise....of course. Both of my daughters love it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the baby snow leopard, can't wait for christmas and my granddaughter opens up her gift.

customer_reviews.title: Way softer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: We love Flurry! She walks really well, I was surprised! So many different noises & super soft to cuddle.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a toy for a charity event. I did not remove it from its protective covering. It was, however, adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is so happy with this toy
customer_reviews.text: Really cute!!! My daughter is so happy with this toy . She ask for the new tiger but I don’t want spend $100 in a toy , I buy this one and she was so happy because it walks and drink milk . I really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Could not beat the cyber Monday price that I got this at! It was larger than j thought for the price and my daughter loved it! Super cute and has lots of fun little noises and features. Very happy we purchased this.

customer_reviews.title: Puuuurfect gift!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters LOVE this thing!! It's super soft and cuddly! I'm not sure if it is something that they are doing wrong, but occasionally it won't do anything when you pat it's back or give it it's bottle. Overall an amazing toy!!

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter FREAKED when she opened this for her 2nd birthday! She plays with it all the time and it works perfect and does everything it says it does. It definitely way bigger than I thought it was going to be! But I guess my daughter can grow into it!!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for Christmas. One for each of my girls (ages 7 and 5). They squealed with joy as they opened them. The toy is really cute and interactive. They both take these everywhere we go now.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas and I cannot believe how soft this is. I totally didn't expect it to be so soft. It works so good and is so adorable ...my daughter absolutely loves it

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and really cute! This Leopard makes cute noises and walks. My 2 year old loves it! It came with a little bottle to pretend feed and a fish toy. My daughter walks around holding and feeding it!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: My 21 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy. Got on "special" for $30. Was his favorite toy Christmas day. It walks, mews, makes little "baby snow tiger" sounds (realistic? who knows), makes slurping noises and kicks legs when you feed her the bottle. Only moves for a few seconds before needing stimulation again. Head is positionable, so are back legs. Baby is under recommended ages but really there are no small loose parts and skill needed to operate is minimal. Interest is probably optimal at this age rather than for older kids. Can recommend based on how my toddler likes it, plus its cute and not annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and soft cat. My daughter loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft cat. My daughter loves it and the little toys that come to play with it!

customer_reviews.title: This is super cute and my Granddaughter loves it

My daughter is 3 1/2 and I think she will enjoy this FurReal Friends pet for many years to come, unless her sister steals it, which is completely possible.

product_meta.title: FurReal Flurry, My Baby Snow Leopard Interactive Plush Toy, Ages 4 & Up
product_meta.description: Meet the furReal Flurry, My Baby Snow Leopard Interactive Plush Toy! This sweet, plush pet is so excited to play with you. She needs tender loving care (listen to the happy sounds she makes when you feed her with her bottle) and lots of playtime (she coos, kicks, and walks to you when you shake her rattle). And of course, any little cub loves to have lots of cuddle time, so she’s always in the mood for a hug. An adorable companion for kids ages 4 and up! furReal and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: REALISTIC PLUSH PET RESPONDS TO YOU: With 45+ sound-&-motion combinations, the furReal Flurry, My Baby Snow Leopard Interactive Plush Toy is full of surprises
LOVES HER BOTTLE: Feed her bottle and listen to her make happy sounds
RESPONDS TO HER RATTLE, TOO: Interactive plush pet coos, kicks, and walks to you when you shake her rattle
SOFT, CUDDLY FUR AND POSEABLE LEGS: Loveable snow leopard cub is oh-so-huggable
GREAT BIRTHDAY OR HOLIDAY GIFT: Girls and boys ages 4 and up are sure to love this interactive plush toy
